text: Tarapara tara yakhana tamra darabare dakhila hala takhana balala -- ''ohe pradhana! Amadera o amadera paribara-parijanera upare durdina ese pareche, ara amara saman'ya drabyamulya niye esechi, sejan'ye amadera purnamatraya dina ebam amadera prati danakhayarata karuna. Nihsandeha allah danasiladera puraskara diye thakena.â€™â€™
